DOC.brief_title: Mastoid Bone Autograft Dorsal Nasal Augmentation
DOC.detailed_description: INTRODUCTION : Several graft and/or implant use dorsal augmentation . In case , especially traumatic , non-caucasian , multi-operated one , amount augmentation higher usually available septal auricular conchal autograft . OBJECTIVE : To evaluate safety efficacy mastoid bone autograft dorsal nasal augmentation rhinoplasty . DESIGN : A prospective study 15 consecutive patient submit dorsal nasal augmentation mastoid bone , 2-year period . SETTING : One major academic medical center .
